abort.already_configured: iCloud3 is already installed and can not be installed again. Select CONFIGURE in the iCloud3 Integration entry to configure iCloud3. If you are deleting and then reinstalling, restart HA first and then reinstall iCloud3
abort.disabled: iCloud3 is DISABLED and can not be installed again. Enable iCloud3, then select CONFIGURE in the iCloud3 Integration entry to configure iCloud3. If you are deleting and then reinstalling, restart HA first and then reinstall iCloud3
abort.login_error: An error occurred logging into the iCloud account. Verify the username and password.
abort.reauth_successful: The reauthentication has been successfully completed
abort.verification_code_accepted: The Apple ID Verification Code was accepted. Reauthentication is complete
abort.verification_code_cancelled: The Apple ID Verification was cancelled
abort.icloud3_init_error: A problem was encountered initializing the iCloud3 Configure Settings screens. iCloud3 has probably encountered an error during initialization and was not started. Check the 'home-assistant.log' file for any errors related to iCloud3

error.invalid_path: The path provided is not valid. Should be in the format `user/repo-name`
error.verification_code_send_error: Failed to send the Apple ID Verification Code
error.verification_code_requested2: The Apple ID Verification Code was requested
error.verification_code_invalid: The Verification Code is not correct. Reenter or request a new code
error.icloud_no_devices: No devices were found in the iCloud 'Family Sharing' list
error.icloud_other_error: An unknown error was encountered authenticating the iCloud account. Try again later

data.continue: Select to continue iCloud3 installation (and parameter migration)
data.continue_restart_ha: Select to continue iCloud3 installation. Then RESTART HOME ASSISTANT.

user.description: iCloud3 v3 Integration is being set up. Select SUBMIT, then select CONFIGURE to configure iCloud3. If you are running iCloud3 v2, the Configuration Parameters will be migrated from v2 to v3.
user.title: iCloud3 v3 Integration Installer

reauth.title: Apple ID Verification Code (HA Notifications)
reauth.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code you just received from Apple

restart_ha.title: Confirm Restarting Home Assistant
restart_ha.description: iCloud3 needs to restart Home Assistant to prevent device_tracker entity name conflicts

abort.already_configured: iCloud3 is already installed and can not be installed again. Select CONFIGURE in the iCloud3 Integration entry to configure iCloud3
abort.disabled: iCloud3 is DISABLED and can not be installed again. Enable iCloud, then select CONFIGURE in the iCloud3 Integration entry to configure iCloud3
abort.reauth_successful: The reauthentication has been successfully completed

error.update_aborted: Update aborted, an error was detected in one of the data fields
error.conf_updated: iCloud3 Configuration Parameters were updated successfully
error.icloud_acct_logged_into: Successfully Logged into the iCloud Account
error.icloud_acct_already_logged_into: Already Logged into the iCloud Account
error.icloud_acct_login_error_user_pw: Login Failed, Invalid Username or Password (err-400)
error.icloud_acct_login_error_other: Login Failed, Other Error or iCloud is not Available
error.icloud_acct_login_error_connection: Login Error, Failed to Connect to iCloud Server (err-302)
error.icloud_acct_not_available: Login Error, iCloud Account is not Available
error.icloud_acct_not_logged_into: iCloud Account is not Logged Into
error.icloud_acct_not_set_up: iCloud Account Username or Password needs to be entered
error.icloud_acct_no_data_source: No Data Source (iCloud or iOS App) has been selected
error.mobile_app_error: The Mobile App Integration is not installed. The iOS App will not be used as a data source; location data and zone enter/exit triggers will not be monitored
error.verification_code_requested: The Apple ID Verification Code was requested, BROWSER REFRESH MAY BE NEEDED
error.verification_code_requested2: The Apple ID Verification Code was requested
error.verification_code_needed: The Apple ID Verification Code is needed
error.verification_code_accepted: The Apple ID Verification Code was accepted
error.verification_code_invalid: The Verification Code was not correct. Reenter or request a new code
error.verification_code_send_error: Failed to send the Apple ID Verification Code
error.inactive_device: Device is INACTIVE. Change to `Track` to locate and track this device
error.inactive_all_devices: ✪✪ ALL DEVICES ARE INACTIVE. NOTHING WILL BE TRACKED ✪✪
error.inactive_most_devices: MOST Devices are INACTIVE and will not be located or tracked
error.inactive_some_devices: Some Devices are INACTIVE and will not be located or tracked
error.inactive_few_devices: A Few Devices are INACTIVE and will not be located or tracked
error.inactive_no_devices: No Devices have been set up. Select `Add Device` and Submit
error.away_time_zone_dup_devices_1: One of these devices is also selected in the Other Device List
error.away_time_zone_dup_devices_2: One of these devices is also selected in the Otner Device List
error.not_numeric: The value entered is not numeric
error.waze_server_error_us: The correct server for your location is: United States, Canada
error.waze_server_error_il: The correct server for your location is: Israel
error.waze_server_error_row: The correct server for your location is: Rest of the World
error.required_field_device: A device providing location data must be selected from the Family Share, Find-my-Friends, or iOS App devices lists
error.no_device_selected: A device providing location data must be selected
error.no_add_entities_device_tracker_fct: The HA component for adding devices is not available. HA MUST BE RESTARTED
error.unknown_devicename: The device that was previously selected can no longer be identified. It`s name may have been changed or it may have been deleted. Reselect the device to be tracked or monitored
error.unknown_value: The value of this parameter in the iCloud3 configuration file is unknown or invalid. It must be selected again
error.unknown_famshr: The FamShr device was not returned from iCloud when iCloud3 started. Check FindMy devices list & Family Share list. See Event Log Startup Stage 4 for more info and a list of the devices returned from the iCloud account
error.unknown_fmf: The FmF device was not returned from iCloud when iCloud3 started. Check FindMy app devices Sharing location info. See Event Log Startup Stage 4 for more info and a list of the devices returned from the iCloud account
error.unknown_iosapp: The mobile_app device_tracker entity was not found during HA Device Registry scan. Check mobile_app device list in HA Settings > Devices & Services > Devices. See Event Log Startup Stage 4 for more info and a list of mobile_app devices found in the HA Device Registry
error.unknown_picture: The Picture filename was not found in the HA config/www directory. Reselect the filename or check to see if it has been deleted
error.unknown_famshr_fmf: Check the FamShr and FmF parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_famshr_fmf_iosapp: Check the FamShr, FmF and iOS App parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_famshr_fmf_iosapp_picture: Check the FamShr, FmF, iOS App and Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_famshr_iosapp: Check the FamShr and iOS App parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_famshr_iosapp_picture: Check the FamShr, iOS App and Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_famshr_picture: Check the FamShr and Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_fmf_iosapp: Check the FmF and iOS App parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_fmf_iosapp_picture: Check the FmF, iOS App and Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_fmf_picture: Check the FmFand Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.unknown_iosapp_picture: Check the iOS App and Picture parameter values (Not found or Invalid)
error.tfz_selection_invalid: The value must be a zone that is being tracked from
error.display_text_as_no_gtsign: The '>' between the ActualText and DisplayAsText is missing
error.duplicate_ic3_devicename: This name is already used by another iCloud3 device
error.already_assigned: This selection is already assigned to another device
error.iosapp_search_error: WARNING: Search Failure - No iOS App device that starts with the iCloud3 or FamShr devicename was found. Select 'None' or the device to be used.
error.duplicate_other_devicename: This name is already used in another integration or platform
error.restart_ha: Home Assistant needs to be restarted to continue
error.excluded_sensors_ha_restart: Excluded Sensors were Updated. An HA restart is required

restart_icloud3.title: Confirm Restarting iCloud3
restart_icloud3.description: Note: Changes to tracked devices require restarting iCloud3

restart_ha_ic3.title: Restart Home Assistant or iCloud3
restart_ha_ic3.description: Restart Home Assistant or reload and reinitialize the iCloud3 Integration

restart_ha_ic3_load_error.title: iCloud3 Load Error
restart_ha_ic3_load_error.description: iCloud3 did not load and initialize when HA started. Reload iCloud3 again or restart HA

icloud_account.title: iCloud Account & iOS App Data Sources
icloud_account.description: The data sources (iCloud Account Web Services and the iOS App) are selected on this screen. The Apple iCloud Account Username/Password must be specified here to access the iCloud Account. The HA Companion App (iOS App) must be installed on the iDevice to use is as a data source for that device. Each iDevice you are tracking is associated with the iCloud3 device on the Update Devices screen.

data.data_source_icloud: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ ICLOUD ACCOUNT - Location data is provided by the Apple iCloud account
data.username: APPLE ID (USERNAME) - The email address used to sign in to the iCloud Account
data.url_suffix_china: CHINA USERS - Use Apple iCloud Web Servers located in China (.cn URL suffix)
data.data_source_iosapp: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ iOS APP - Location data is provided by the HA iOS App

reauth.title: Apple ID Verification Code
reauth.description: Enter the 6-digit verification code you just received from Apple

device_list.title: iCloud3 Device Tracker Entities
device_list.description: All of the devices that are tracked or monitored by iCloud3 are listed on this screen. You can add new devices and update or delete existing devices.

data.ic3_devicename: ICLOUD3 DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY ID - The HA device_tracker entity assigned to this device
data.fname: FRIENDLY NAME - Displayed in HA device_tracker and sensor names and on the Event Log
data.device_type: DEVICE TYPE - iPhone, iPad, Watch, etc.
data.tracking_mode: TRACKING MODE - How location requests should be done (Full tracking, Monitor, Inactive)
data.iosapp: iOS APP INSTALLED - The HA iOS App is installed on this device

update_device.title: Update Tracked iCloud3 Device
update_device.description: This screen lets you configure each of the devices that can be tracked or monitored using iCloud3

data.ic3_devicename: ICLOUD3 DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY ID - The HA device_tracker entity assigned to this device
data.fname: FRIENDLY NAME - Displayed in HA device_tracker and sensor names and on the Event Log
data.device_type: DEVICE TYPE - iPhone, iPad, Watch, etc.
data.tracking_mode: TRACKING MODE - How location requests should be done (Full tracking, Monitor, Inactive)
data.famshr_devicename: FAMILY SHARING LIST DEVICE - Use location data from this iCloud Acct Family Sharing member
data.fmf_email: FIND-MY-FRIENDS DEVICE - Use location data from this FindMy device sharing their info with you
data.iosapp_device: IOS APP DEVICE_TRACKER ENTITY - Use this HA device location data & zone enter/exit triggers
data.log_zones: LOG ACTIVITY FOR ZONES - Enter/exit zone info (date, time, distance) is saved to a spreadsheet .csv file
data.track_from_zones: TRACK-FROM-ZONES - Track travel time & distance from Home and other zones
data.track_from_base_zone: TRACK FROM ZONE - Use this zone instead of the Home for tracking results
data.picture: PICTURE - Photo image of the person normally using this device (40x40 pixels is best size)

data_description.inzone_interval: Time between location requests when in a zone
data_description.fixed_interval: A fixed time between location requests when not in a zone. If set (>0), this value is used instead of the  calculating the interval using the distance from home.
data_description.track_from_base_zone: Normally, the Home zone is used as the primary Track-from-Zone for all tracking (travel time, distance, etc).  However, a different zone can be used as the primary Track-from-Zone if you are away from Home for an extended period or the device is normally at another location (vacation house, second home, parent's house, etc.). This can be set Globally for all devices on the Special Zones screen.

review_inactive_devices.title: Review Untracked (Inactive) Devices
review_inactive_devices.description: The 'Tracking Mode' of devices are set to 'Inactive' and will not be located or tracked.

change_device_order.title: Event Log Device Display Sequence
change_device_order.description: The devices are displayed in the Event Log heading area and in various Event Log messages in the sequence below. This screen lets you change the order of the devices.

away_time_zone.title: Display Location Time Zone when Away
away_time_zone.description: The time displayed in the Event Log and Sensors show the time an event took place using the Home 'time zone' from your Home Assistant computer.  When you are away from Home and in another time zone, your tracking events are still based on the time at your Home 'time zone', not time in your current location. This screen lets you display time events using your current location's time zone.

data.away_time_zone_1_devices: Devices that will display time events based on this location time
data.away_time_zone_2_devices: Devices that will display time events based on this location time

data_description.time_zone_1_offset: PRIMARY DEVICES & LOCATION TIME - Devices and the current location time when away and in another time zone
data_description.time_zone_2_offset: SECONDARY DEVICES & LOCATION TIME - Devices and the current location time when away and in another time zone

format_settings.title: Format Settings
format_settings.description: Tracking activity, results and information messages are displayed in the Event log, sensors and device_tracker entities for tracked and monitored devices. With this screen, you can specify the how these results should be displayed.

data.log_level: LOG LEVEL - The type of messages that are added to the HA log file by iCloud3
data.display_zone_format: EVENT LOG ZONE DISPLAY NAME - How the Zone name is displayed in sensors and the Event Log
data.device_tracker_state_source: DEVICE TRACKER STATE VALUE - How the device's device_tracker entity state value is determined
data.time_format: TIME FORMAT - How time fields are displayed in sensors and in the Event Log
data.unit_of_measurement: UNIT OF MEASUREMENT - How distance fieldsare displayed in sensors and in the Event Log
data.display_gps_lat_long2: DISPLAY GPS COORDINATES - Display the GPS (Latitude, Longitude/±Accuracy) or only the GPS (/±Accuracy) in the Event Log
data.display_gps_lat_long: DISPLAY GPS COORDINATES - Display GPS-(22.32771, -76.33073/±35m) instead of GPS-/±35m in the Event Log

data_description.device_tracker_state_source: HA uses the device's gps coordinates to determine the zone. The gps accuracy is not considered so the zone may be exited when the gps wanders out of the zone. iCloud3 does consider the gps accuracy and will not exit the zone when this occurs. iCloud3 will display the Zone's Friendly Name or zone name displayed on the Event Log.

display_text_as.title: Event Log 'Display Text As'
display_text_as.description: There may be some text fields that are displayed on the Event Log screen that may be sensitive in nature. Some examples include email addresses or phone numbers. With this screen, you can select the Original Text and what should be displayed instead. For example, you can replace 'geekstergary@apple.com' with 'gary@email.com'

data.display_text_as: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ TEXT REPLACEMENT FIELDS - [Actual text > Displayed text]

display_text_as_update.title: Update Event Log 'Display Text As' Value

data.text_from: ORIGINAL TEXT - Text to be replaced (example: gary_real_email@gmail.com)
data.text_to: DISPLAYED TEXT- Text to be displayed (display:  gary@email.com)

tracking_parameters.title: Tracking & Other Parameters
tracking_parameters.description: The parameters on this screen do not fall into any of the other general categories and are rarely changed.

data.log_level: LOG LEVEL - The type of messages that are added to the HA log file during iCloud3 operations
data.distance_between_devices: USE LOCATION RESULTS FROM A NEAR-BY DEVICE
data.event_log_card_directory: EVENT LOG CARD LOVELACE RESOURCES DIRECTORY - Event Log custom card .js file directory
data.event_log_btnconfig_url: EVENT LOG CONFIGURE BUTTON (GEAR) URL > Special URL that display's the HA Configure Settings screen

data_description.old_location_threshold: Locations older than this value will be discarded
data_description.old_location_adjustment: Add this to the time that determines if a location is old
data_description.distance_between_devices: When tracking results are updated, any nearby devices are identified. When tracking results for those devices are updated, the tracking results of the one originally updated can be used instead. This improves performance since the Waze route time and distance are not requested again
data_description.gps_accuracy_threshold: Locations with GPS Accuracy above this value will be discarded
data_description.tfz_tracking_max_distance: Normally the Home zone's time and distance data is displayed on the Device's device_tracker and sensor entities. Display the Track-from-Zone instead when the Device is within this distance of the Track-from-Zone
data_description.max_interval: The maximum time between location requests
data_description.exit_zone_interval: The time to the first location request after exiting a zone
data_description.iosapp_alive_interval: Send a location request to the iOS App if there has been no contact after this amount of time. This will check to see if the iOS App is responding to location requests or is asleep and not running.
data_description.offline_interval: Location request interval when offline (Airplane mode, dead cell area, etc.)
data_description.travel_time_factor: Next location time = Waze travel time to zone * this value
data_description.event_log_btnconfig_url: Normally, this is blank and iCloud3 will determine the URL for it's Configure Settings screen. However, if there is a problem caused by running HA in a virtual environment, docker or on another device and the actual URL can not be detemined, a 404 not found error may be encountered. If that happens, select it the normal way (HA Devices & Services > Integration > iCloud3 > Configure Settings gear) and copy the URL from the browser into this field.

inzone_intervals.title: inZone Parameters and Default Intervals
inzone_intervals.description: An inZone interval is the time between location requests when the Device is in a zone. This screen sets the default values for different types of devices. This value is assigned to a device when it is added. You can then change it on the Update Device screen

data.discard_poor_gps_inzone: Discard Location Updates with Poor GPS Accuracy when in a Zone
data.distance_between_devices: Determine the distance between devices. Use a near by device's tracking results
data.center_in_zone: Change Device's Location to the Zone's Center when in a Zone

data_description.no_iosapp: Default interval if the iOS App is not used for location monitoring and zone enter/exit triggers

data.waze_region: ROUTE SERVER LOCATION - Location of the Waze Route Server for your area
data.waze_realtime: USE REAL TIME DATA - Waze should consider traffic delays when determining travel time
data.waze_history_track_direction: GENERAL TRAVEL DIRECTION - Used to display 'Map Trace Lines' between saved locations

data_description.waze_min_distance: Use the Waze Route Service when the zone distance is greater than this value
data_description.waze_max_distance: Do not use the Waze Route Service when the zone distance is greater than than this value
data_description.waze_history_max_distance: Do not save the Waze travel time & distance to the Waze History Database if the distance is greater than this value

special_zones.title: Special Zones - Enter Zone Delay, Stat Zone, Track-from-Home Zone Override
special_zones.description: This screen lets you configure an enter zone delay time, stationary zones and set up a temporary 'home' zone at another location

data.stat_zone_fname: FRIENDLY NAME BASE - Name to display when in a Stationary Zone (StatZone)
data.track_from_base_zone: TRACK FROM ZONE - Use this zone instead of Home for tracking results for all devices. Global setting
data.track_from_home_zone: TRACK FROM HOME ZONE - Keep tracking from the Home zone when the Primary Track From Zone is not Home

data_description.passthru_zone_time: Delay processing an Enter Zone Trigger that you may be driving through and not actually entering
data_description.stat_zone_still_time: Time at the same location before moving into a Stationary Zone
data_description.stat_zone_inzone_interval: Time interval between location requests when in a Stationary Zone
data_description.stat_zone_fname: Display this value in the Event Log, device_tracker, travel direction and zone entities when the device is in a Stationary Zone. iCloud3 assigns a number to the Stationary Zone. Use the wildcard character '#' to display this value in the Stationary Zone's name (StatZon1, StatZon2, etc). Note: A 7-letter name leaves room for the name and number to be displayed on iPhone screens without being truncated.

sensors.title: Device and Tracking Sensors created by iCloud3
sensors.description: Many sensors are used to display tracking results and other information for a device. This screen is used to select the sensors that should be created.

data.monitored_devices: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ MONITORED DEVICE SENSORS - Select the type of sensors to create for a Monitored Device
data.device: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ DEVICE SENSORS - Device status and information
data.tracking_update: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ LOCATION UPDATE SENSORS - Device location update times
data.track_from_zones: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ TRACK FROM MULTIPLE ZONE SENSORS - Used when tracking from more than one zone (not needed for tracking only from the Home zone)
data.tracking_other: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ OTHER TRACKING SENSORS - Not normally used but available
data.zone: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ ZONE SENSORS - Device zone status and information
data.other: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ OTHER SENSORS - Sensors not in the above areas
data.excluded_sensors: ═════════════════════════════════════════════════════ EXCLUDED SENSORS - Sensors that will not be created when iCloud3 starts

exclude_sensors.title: Exclude Sensors
exclude_sensors.description: Many sensors are created for the devices but there may be times when you want to not create a sensor for a specific device. For example, you may want to create a bettery sensor for all devices except one. This screen lets you specify the sensor entity name that should not be created.

data.excluded_sensors: EXCLUDED SENSORS - Sensors that will not be created when iCloud3 starts
data.filter: FILTER DISPLAYED SENSORS - Select the Sensors that should be displayed
data.filtered_sensors: ICLOUD3 SENSORS - A list of Sensors that are created when iCloud3 starts

action.name: Action
action.description: This service will send operational commands to iCloud3

command.name: Command
command.description: (Required) The operational command to send to iCloud3

device_name.name: Device Name
device_name.description: (Optional) Apply all devices or only apply to the selected device

update.name: Update
update.description: The Update service has been replaced by the Action service

find_iphone_alert.name: Find iPhone Alert Tone
find_iphone_alert.description: This service will send an alert tone to the device that you want to find

device_name.name: Device Name
device_name.description: Device the Find iPhone Alert and Message should be sent to

lost_device_alert.name: Send Lost Device Message
lost_device_alert.description: This service will send a Message and Phone number to the lost iPhone

device_name.name: Device Name
device_name.description: Device the Find iPhone Alert and Message should be sent to

number.name: Phone Number
number.description: The phone number to send the message to
